The Lord of the Rings Online

wikitext.*:
[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Kingstead map.jpg|thumb|250px|Map of Kingstead in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']]
'''King's Lands''' was an area adjacent to [[Edoras]], including [[Harrowdale]]. With Edoras it was the ward of the [[First Marshal of the Riddermark]].<ref>{{UT|Isen}}, Appendix (i)</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2013: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:The area called "Kingstead" encompasses [[Harrowdale]] and [[Dunharrow]]. It includes the smaller hamlets of [[Upbourn]] and [[Underharrow]] to the south of [[Edoras]] as well as two larger towns north of [[Snowbourn]]: "Middlemead" and [[Entwade]], the latter guarding the ford of the same name.
